about_the_game:
Sewing Stuff is a delightful and immersive game that invites you to explore your creativity and precision with every stitch. Your goal is to restore various objects—ranging from delicate butterflies to juicy burgers, classic guitars, and beyond—by skillfully threading and connecting points to bring them back to their original forms.

As you advance through the levels, you'll face an ever-growing array of objects, each presenting its own unique set of connection points and challenges. Mastering the game requires you to select the perfect thread, pattern, and tension, making precise movements to ensure a flawless finish. Each level tests your ability to plan ahead, avoid errors, and complete your sewing tasks within a set time limit.

Whether you're a veteran seamstress or a newcomer to the craft, Sewing Stuff offers a fun and engaging way to hone your sewing skills while letting your creativity run wild. Ready to sew your way to perfection? Download Sewing Stuff now and start stitching your masterpieces!

Main Game Features:

- Challening missions
- A variety of unfinished objects to complete
- Unlimited attempts for endless fun and practice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 74 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 74 MB available space
